member.name: T:DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus
member.summary: Returns codes that indicate the status of an operation.

member.name: F:DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus.Success
member.summary: An operation was performed successfully

member.name: F:DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus.Failure
member.summary: An operation failed

member.name: T:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler
member.summary: Defines the fingerprint enrollment control events

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnDelete(System.Object,System.Int32,DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus@)
member.summary: Fires when a user commits to delete an enrolled fingerprint. The application handles the deletion of the fingerprint template from a fingerprint data storage subsystem and can display its own success or error messages.
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint
Enumeration that receives and contains one of the values from DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnEnroll(System.Object,System.Int32,DPFP.Template,DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus@)
member.summary: Fires when a user enrolls a fingerprint, and returns a fingerprint template. The application handles the storage of the fingerprint template in a fingerprint data storage subsystem and can display its own success or error messages.
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint
Enumeration that receives and contains one of the values from DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnFingerTouch(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when a user touches a fingerprint reader
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnFingerRemove(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when a user removes a finger from a fingerprint reader
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnComplete(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint sample is successfully captured by a fingerprint reader
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnReaderConnect(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint reader is attached to a system
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnReaderDisconnect(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint reader is disconnected from a system
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnSampleQuality(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32,DPFP.Capture.CaptureFeedback)
member.summary: Fires when the quality of a fingerprint sample is verified
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnStartEnroll(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when enrollment has begun
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Enrollment.EventHandler.OnCancelEnroll(System.Object,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Fires when enrollment is cancelled
member.param: Int that contains the index value for the enrolled fingerprint

member.summary: Returns or assigns the value for the maximum number of fingerprints that can be enrolled

member.summary: Defines the fingerprint verification control events

member.name: M:DPFP.Gui.Verification.EventHandler.OnComplete(System.Object,DPFP.FeatureSet,DPFP.Gui.EventHandlerStatus@)
member.summary: Fires when a fingerprint feature set created for the purpose of verification is ready for comparison and returns the fingerprint feature set. The application handles the comparison of the fingerprint feature set with a fingerprint template.
member.param: Eventhandler status, to be set by eventhandler if needed
